text: fdhhb musaa walkhadir hataa 'ataya 'ahl qryt, ftlba minhum teamana ealaa sabil aldyaft, famtne 'ahl alqaryat ean dyafthma, fawajada fiha haytana mayla ywshk 'ana ysqt, feddal alkhadir maylah hataa sar mstwyana, qal lah mwsa: law shit lakhdht ealaa hadha aleamal ajrana tsrfh fi thsyl teamna hayth lm ydyfwna
